body: INTERNATIONAL A3-25 Germany Paroles Hijacker, Who Killed American in '85 A Lebanese man convicted of killing an American Navy diver during the 1985 hijacking of a T.W.A. jetliner has been released by German authorities, after serving 19 years in jail. A State Department spokesman said that the United States was disappointed with the release and
title: News Summary

body: The remnants of Hurricane Wilma combined with a northeaster yesterday to drop nearly two inches of rain on the region and rake the New Jersey coast with high winds and a pounding surf that eroded beaches and undermined boardwalks. Minor flooding was reported in Bay Head, Manasquan and Washington Township in Burlington County. Some areas of Cape May
title: Storm Rakes Region, but Isn't as Bad as Forecasters Feared

body: A 22-year-old man was fatally shot last night in Seagate, the police said, and his killer was being sought. The man, whose name was not released by the authorities, was shot in the neck at 3194 Bayview Avenue around 10:30 p.m., the police said. He was taken to Coney Island Hospital and pronounced dead. Michelle O'Donnell (NYT)
title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Fatal Shooting In Seagate
